songs.title: Throw Away
songs.lyrics:
[Part I]

[Intro]
Nard & B

[Chorus]
It's gon' be okay, okay, oh it's gon' be okay (ok!)
Well, my nigga we don't play but you gone be okay (FBG)
I want no relations (no!), I just want your facial (right)
I want no relations, I just want your facial (yeah)
Pour some alcohol and drank it baby, go and taste it (drank it)
Pour some alcohol and drank it baby, go and taste it (okay!)
I want no relations (okay), I just want your facial (okay)
Girl you know you like a pistol, you a throw away

[Verse]
We gon' drank girl
We gon' drink like it’s Cinco De Mayo (and smoke!)
I won't ever tell you anything your heart desires (aw nah)
It's gon' be okay okay girl it's gone be okay (wild-wild)
I don't want no confrontation it's too complicated (fa sho)
Pour my lean for me baby you a hottie thottie (okay)
I'ma fuck you in Atlanta like we on an island (yeah!)
I can't lose my concentration girl
I can't go on no dates (I can't go)
If we have a conversation gotta fuck today (woo!)
I ain't disrespectful never
I ain't disrespectful (I ain't disrespectful)
Got a black girl and a white one
Call em salt and pepper (aw gon')
I copped one of em a Bimmer and one a Kompressor (skrr)
I told her I would call her back and I forgot to text her
(Free Bandz!)

[Chorus]
It's gon' be okay okay oh it's gon' be okay (okay)
Well, my nigga we don't play but you gon' be okay (FBG)
I want no relations (no!), I just want your facial (right)
I want no relations (no), I just want your facial (hey)
Pour some alcohol and drank it baby
Gon' and taste it (drank up)
Pour some alcohol and drank it baby, gon' and taste it (okay)
I want no relations (okay), I just want your facial (okay)
Girl you know you like a pistol, you a throw away

[Outro]
DJ Esco Moe City, the coolest DJ on the motherfuckin' planet

[Part II]

[Intro]
Deep down
I believe you know you're a monster too

[Refrain]
Go on, fuck that nigga, get it over with
Go on, fuck that nigga, get it over with
Go on, fuck that nigga, get it over with
Go on, fuck that nigga, get it over with
Yeah-yeah, yeah yeah yeah

[Spoken]
Future Hendrix
I know your true feelings ain't...
They couldn't be here, you hear me?
They gotta be somewhere else

[Chorus]
But I ain't worried 'bout no fucking
I ain't worried 'bout no fucking
Does sexing on the late night mean that much to you?
My love don't mean that much to you
Fucking these hoes mean too damn much to you
I just hope when you fucking on that nigga
When you finished, he gon' say that he love you
Now do you feel better 'bout yourself?
Do you feel better by yourself?
Did you feel better when I left?
Mark my words I'ma ball without you
I came home last night to a ménage, ayy
Got my dick sucked I was thinking about you
I was fucking on a slut and I was thinking about you
When you fucking on that nigga, hope you thinking about me
When you laying with that nigga, hope you thinking about me
Cause I'm thinking about you

[Refrain]
Go on, fuck that nigga, get it over with
Go on, fuck that nigga, get it over with

[Verse]
I want you to fuck him in paradise
'Cause I wanna be in your head tonight
If loving me in public ain't safe
You can take my love in private
Don't give up on me today
Hold on to me like a true love
I told you it was a true love
I ended up with temptations
You going out the country, you posting up on IG
I'm laid up with my side-piece
The one that text while you was right there
Laying up beside me
Now tell me you don't want me
Tell me that your pussy ain't mines no more
Tell me your moving on, you don't love me no more
Monster

[Chorus]
But I ain't worried 'bout no fucking
I ain't worried 'bout no fucking
Does sexing on the late night mean that much to you?
My love don't mean that much to you
Fucking these hoes mean too damn much to you
I just hope when you fucking on that nigga
When you finished, he gon' say that he love you
Now do you feel better 'bout yourself?
Do you feel better by yourself?
Did you feel better when I left?
Mark my words, I'ma ball without you
I came home last night to a ménage, ayy
Got my dick sucked and I was thinking about you
I was fucking on a slut and I was thinking about you
When you fucking on that nigga, hope you thinking about me
When you laying with that nigga, hope you thinking about me
Cause I'm thinking about you

[Refrain]
Go on, fuck that nigga, get it over with
Go on, fuck that nigga, get it over with
